name: EB Capital
goal: We are a Belgian limited company working as management and public affairs consultants. We dedicate ourselves in representing various clients from various sectors (healthcare, food and nutrition, environment, sustainable development...). We support our clients in organizing events (press conferences, seminars,...) and are led to make visits to the European Parliament to monitor EU policy making for our clients.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market
euInitiatives:
Subjects concerning:

- urban policies (waste management, sustainable development, mobility...). Urban intergroup.

- health policies (osteopathy, alternative medicine...)
- internal market
customers: Brussels Times,European Federation of Osteopaths,Forum for Osteopathic Regulation in Europe
